File libsrc/libgmethod/Cut.c

Public Function Index

new_Cut (double, double)
Create a Cut object.
Cut_addMethod ()
Register the Cut as a readable GMethod.

Public Functions

new_Cut 
 Cut new_Cut(double begSelect,
             double endSelect)
Create a Cut object. Cut is a GMethod object that cuts out all or part of a waveform.

Parameters:
begSelect - The beginning epochal time of the cut.
endSelect - The ending epochal time of the cut.
Returns:
a Cut object, or NULL if malloc fails (logErrorMsg will be called)
Cut_addMethod 
 void Cut_addMethod()
Register the Cut as a readable GMethod. This routine should be called once before a Cut is read from a file.
